main.title: Innovative Fleet Management
main.subtitle: Complete solution for your fleet management needs with advanced features and real-time monitoring.

features.heading: OUR PRODUCTS
features.title: All the tools you need to manage your fleet in one place
features.subtitle: Easy coordination with ELD, Real-time GPS tracking, Dispatch, and Dash cameras

eld.title: ELD Compliance Solution
eld.description: Our FMCSA-certified ELD compliance solution offers comprehensive features for complete fleet management

gps.title: Asset Tracker
gps.description: The most effective solution to secure your assets through advanced GPS tracking. Perfect for those who prioritize driver and truck safety

dispatch.title: Dispatcher Panel
dispatch.description: Optimize daily operations, save time, and focus on high-revenue loads with our comprehensive dispatch solution

camera.title: Dash Camera System
camera.description: Protect your business with our advanced dash camera system. Reduce liability and insurance costs while improving driver safety

compliance.title: Everything you need, all in one place
compliance.subtitle: We built and tested the ELD with truckers in mind, which is why our extensive features offer a simplified experience.

compliance.title: Compliance
compliance.description: Fully FMCSA compliant to pass your roadside inspections

records.title: Maintain and audit records
records.description: Monitor and maintain your records and exercise e-log flexibility

messaging.title: Driver Messaging
messaging.description: Send messages, images or files directly through the app

nightMode.title: Night Mode
nightMode.description: Darkened design to ease strain on your eyes. Power saving for your device

easyAccess.title: Easy Access
easyAccess.description: Easily access most used pages and using certify, bulk certify all your past uncertified records

scanner.title: Document Scanner
scanner.description: Easily scan documents like a professional

dashboard.title: Smart Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Work smarter, not harder. We present our dashboard where you can access all vehicles and drivers information. Plan ahead of time for fuel, scale, weigh stations or upcoming weather.

monitor.title: Monitor every vehicle
monitor.description: All important vehicle information is in one place: vehicle and driver duty status, current location, current fuel level and speed. In addition, view drivers remaining HOS time and be on top of driver who are currently in HOS Violation.

map.title: Customizable Map
map.description: With customizable dashboard map you can choose the style you like the most. Use filters to view traffic, group vehicles, and find nearest Weigh Station, CAT Scales and wide variety of truck stops.

styles.title: Custom Map Styles
styles.description: Choose from multiple map styles to match your preferences

filtering.title: Advanced Filtering
filtering.description: Filter traffic data and group vehicles efficiently

facilities.title: Nearby Facilities
facilities.description: Locate nearest weigh stations, CAT scales, and truck stops

weather.title: Weather Map
weather.description: Plan ahead of time using weather filters. Stay informed about upcoming rain, snow, and storm conditions. Monitor temperature, humidity, and weather patterns across your routes.

updates.title: Real-time Weather Updates
updates.description: Access current weather conditions and forecasts

alerts.title: Storm Alerts
alerts.description: Get notified about severe weather conditions

location.title: Live Location Share
location.description: Satisfy your Brokers and Shippers by sharing your vehicle's live location. Remove the stress and concerns about the driver's location and arrival times.

sharing.title: Easy Sharing
sharing.description: Share location links with expiration dates

security.title: Secure Access
security.description: Control who can view driver information

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Connect your essential third-party apps to benefit from real-time data, improve efficiencies, and reduce operational costs

macroPoint.title: Descartes MacroPoint
macroPoint.description: Descartes MacroPoint is purpose-built to provide end-to-end visibility through every stage of the transportation journey, all from a single provide

fourKites.title: FourKites
fourKites.description: Real-time transportation visibility allows you to have the exact location of your vehicles and shipments in real time

project44.title: Project44
project44.description: Helps manage the supply chain with precision and efficiency by making vehicles visible at all times

truckerTools.title: TruckerTools
truckerTools.description: Load tracking and digital freight matching solution that helps cut your costs

amousTMS.title: Amous TMS
amousTMS.description: TMS with a unique architectural approach that enables users to benefit from several micro-services

truckerCloud.title: Trucker Cloud
truckerCloud.description: Allows tech companies to quickly connect with the industry's leading ELD's, so you can gather data and gain insight, faster.

slides.title: Our Integration Partners
slides.subtitle: Seamlessly connect with leading logistics platforms
